interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Kristin Ess The Oversized Satin Scrunchie ? Cheetah
Review Date: 2022/05/23
Store: Kristin Ess
Product Description: ['But make it fashun! This chic satin, oversized scrunchie can be wrapped once or twice depending on the thickness of your hair. Try securing your ponytail with a regular elastic first and then put this over to maximize the look!']
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Satin', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Kristin Ess', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 6.26 x 1.46 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'Item model number': '184-KES-0309', 'UPC': '840797141438'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:1caeab65346b101dab4627efe802e13f]] This has no stretch whatsoever. It’s literally just a super tight hair tie wrapped in a bunch of extra, unnecessary fabric. I have waist length hair and only use scrunchies because it’s the only thing that stretches enough and holds my hair. This is not it ladies.
Review Title: Absolutely not
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Hair Accessories Preference:** User favors scrunchies specifically designed for thick hair but values functionality over fashion. 
- **Material Sensitivity:** Prefers stretchy materials for hair accessories; dissatisfaction noted with non-stretchy or tight products.
- **Quality Expectations:** User expects high performance from purchased items. Disappointment reflected in low ratings when the product fails to meet expectations.   
- **Product Rating Pattern:** Tends to provide honest feedback, impacting ratings based on practicality.
- **Focus on Functionality:** Selects items that can securely manage long hair while being user-friendly. 

This summary highlights the user’s preference for practical, effective hair accessories, especially those that accommodate longer, thicker hair, suggesting a trend towards seeking reliable functionality in their beauty product choices.
